newsitem.title: SENEGAL: W.Africa Central Bank discount rate falls to 7 pct.
newsitem.headline: W.Africa Central Bank discount rate falls to 7 pct.

text.p: The West African Central Bank (BCEAO) has lowered its discount and refinancing rates by a quarter of a point to seven and six percent respectively, the Bank said in a statement.
The new rates took effect on Monday, it added. They apply to banks in seven member states -- Benin, Burkina Faso, Ivory Coast, Mali, Niger, Senegal and Togo.
The statement said the drop was justified by falling domestic inflation and falling interest rates abroad and a desire to ease the cost of credit.
